author: esm
msg: [PLUTO-384]: PortletContextManager now throws a portletcontainerexception when a portlet context cannot be found in the registry (per the interface spec)

author: snoopdave
msg: Ridiculously lame throttle crap won't work unless it's before post/put of entry. Also, made it optional in case there are databases with reasonable timestamp support. rollerweblogger.org now passes online Ape testing (http://tbray.org/ape).
